COUNCIL:
What is your vision for the municipality of the above Council? (maximum 50 words)
Safety and Security, Regular maintenance and updates to facilities at parks, Ensuring money
from rates is being used appropriately, community engagement, sustainable development,
infrastructure improvement, and enhanced public services. I will emphasize collaboration with
residents and stakeholders to identify priorities and develop initiatives that meet the needs of
the community.

What expertise or attributes do you have which would help you in undertaking the role of Councillor?
Provide details (maximum 50 words)
Leadership experience, Communication Skills: empathetic, Familiar with the specific
challenges and opportunities faced by my council, problem-solving skills, Ability to handle
multiple responsibilities and prioritize tasks effectively. A strong desire to serve the community
and improve the quality of life for residents. Knowledge of local governance structures,
processes, and policies.
Have you read the current Council Plan for the council named above?
Have you read the current Councillor Code of Conduct for the council named above?

Are you endorsed by a registered political party?
Note: Registered political party has the same meaning as in Part 4 of the Electoral Act 2002.
If yes, provide the name of the registered political party.

current term of office?
